title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Simulation-Based Training for Strengthening Healthcare Educator Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Applying a structured instructional design model (e.g., ADDIE) in medical education design to ensure over 80% participant success in project completion
Utilizing at least four diverse teaching methods (lectures, role-playing, feedback sessions, etc.) contextually in simulated patient scenarios
Defining and applying at least three educational effectiveness metrics through assessment tool development and analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
